amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for American History and Civics National Activities under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act by $500,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 45 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase funding for American History and Civics National Activities under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act by $500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A043) Agreed to by recorded vote: 327 - 97 (Roll no. 292).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A043) Agreed to by recorded vote: 327 - 97 (Roll no. 292).
